instructions: Edit this file with your historical bot data from the audit log, then run the populate script

bots.comment: This is an example bot. Replace with your actual data from audit log.
Another example - add your ETH trades here

notes: To populate bots from your audit log:
1. Go to the Audit Log page in your app
3. Group trades by symbol (BTC/USD, ETH/USD, etc.)
4. For each symbol, create a bot entry above
5. Add all trades for that symbol as 'entries'
6. Match the configuration (initialOrderAmount, stepPercent, etc.) to your actual strategy
7. Set status to 'completed' if you've already exited, 'active' if still running
8. Save this file and run: npm run populate-bots
